responseText: Hey there adventurer, get your hands dirty yet? Sometimes all I want to do is play in the dirt. It's pretty rewarding taking the fruits of your labor and turning them into delicious sustenance - anyone can appreciate that, right? Now then, Blackberries don't plant themselves! I mean, not in a garden plot anyway. Go on and do some farming!
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Farming_Tama_8_Response
